items.title: OpenRPC Specification Extension
items.description: A standard way to define OpenRPC Specification Extensions. This makes it easier to provide support for Specification Extensions in other tools.

openrpcExtension.title: openrpcExtensionVersion
openrpcExtension.description: **REQUIRED**. This string MUST be the semantic version number of the Specification that the document uses.

name.title: specificationExtensionName
name.description: **REQUIRED** Name of the Specification Extension. MUST start with `x-`

version.title: specificationExtensionVersion
version.description: **REQUIRED**. The version of the Extension (which is distinct from the `openrpcExtension` version and implementation version).

required.title: specificationExtensionRequired
required.description: wether or not this specification extension is required or not

restricted.title: restrictedObjects
restricted.description: A list of object names to restrict the usage of the specification extension to.

description.title: specificationExtensionDescription
description.description: Markdown description describing the specification extension.

summary.title: specificationExtensionSummary
summary.description: A short summary of what the specification extension is.

externalDocumentation.title: specificationExtensionExternalDocumentationObject
externalDocumentation.description: Information about specification extension external documentation.
